definition.script:
node { cleanWs()
stage('Preparation') { // for display purposes sh ''' # Move into the Jenkins master directory cd /var/lib/jenkins
# Add all new, changed and deleted files # Unwanted files must be listed in .gitignore sudo git add --all
# Commit, and ignore if the commit is empty sudo git commit -m "Jenkins config change" || true
#sudo git config --global user.email palash10rangari@gmail.com #sudo git config --global user.name palashrangari
# Push changes outside of the Jenkins directory
sudo git push https://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@github.com/palashrangari/jenkins-backup.git
''' } }
